items.sentence: I don't think it'll rain, but I'll take an umbrella in case it does.
Tom took the sheets off the bed and put them in the washing machine.
If our prices are too high, people will spend their money elsewhere.
You promised me you wouldn't spend any more money on computer games.
You'd be amazed how many apples you can buy for two hundred dollars.
We need to make sure that what Tom told us happened really happened.
I've always loved the idea of not being what people expect me to be.
You can download the instruction manual for the heat exchanger here.
Which musical instrument do you think is the most difficult to play?
If the weather had been nice yesterday, we would've gone to the zoo.
Tom doesn't seem to be as passionate about that as Mary seems to be.
Tom grabbed the snow shovel and went outside to shovel the sidewalk.
My house is on your left as you go up the street towards the church.
Our ancestors developed massive jaws as a result of constant combat.
My son practices with his Little League baseball team every weekend.
Parents who work at home get to spend more time with their children.
I spent a few minutes talking to the man at the information counter.
Tom got rid of the bloody knife and washed his hands very carefully.
The party in power is corrupt, but the opposition isn't much better.
I don't think that Tom knows why Mary doesn't like living in Boston.
Someday I hope that I can speak French as well as you speak English.
Tom didn't seem to care that Mary didn't do what he asked her to do.
Tom realized that he didn't have enough money to buy what he needed.
I don't think that you need to tell Tom what Mary is planning to do.
I don't think that Tom knows for certain when Mary will be arriving.
Everybody seemed to already know Tom and Mary were getting divorced.
Tom wants Mary to know he isn't planning on asking her to marry him.
I think it's very, very unlikely that Tom knows Mary's phone number.
There were many things that needed to be done before we could leave.
If you're not busy next weekend, why don't you come fishing with me?
You ought to tell Tom that you aren't planning on staying very long.
As food and drink is to animals, so are rain and sunshine to plants.
This is one of the best Chinese restaurants that I've ever eaten at.
After Tom started studying grammar, his French improved quite a bit.
Even though I'm better at French, I really want to speak in English.
Our house is the only one in this area that survived the earthquake.
That teacher sometimes hits his students, but nobody ever complains.
When the heater in the barn fails, you get milk-flavoured ice cubes.
Would it be OK with you if we continued this conversation in French?
Whenever I go out, my parents keep texting me to make sure I'm okay.
Tom was stupid enough to go out with Mary, even though he hated her.
I could tell by the look on Tom's face that he didn't like the idea.
The female student that sat in front of the teacher is from Germany.
Mary wasn't the only girl who said she was interested in doing that.
Tom was convinced that the food he had just eaten had been poisoned.
How much would it cost to send this package by airmail to Australia?
On a day like this, you should definitely wear a hat and sunglasses.
You always wear a ponytail. Why not try pigtails every now and then?
I'll have finished reading this novel by the time you come tomorrow.
The human race has one really effective weapon and that is laughter.
